body_html: It sounds like your loopback performance is also bottlenecked by single-threaded memcpy, 20 Gbps loopback seems low given that AWS can do 25 Gbps over ethernet (ps, my earlier numbers are GBps rather than Gbps)
body_text: It sounds like your loopback performance is also bottlenecked by single-threaded memcpy, 20 Gbps loopback seems low given that AWS can do 25 Gbps over ethernet (ps, my earlier numbers are GBps rather than Gbps)
body: It sounds like your loopback performance is also bottlenecked by single-threaded memcpy, 20 Gbps loopback seems low given that AWS can do 25 Gbps over ethernet (ps, my earlier numbers are GBps rather than Gbps)
